content: People looking for non-custodial betting platform may be interested in BetSwirl. There are currently four games available, namely Dice, CoinToss, Roulette, and Russian Roulette. Bets can be placed using Matic, Avax, BNB on their respective chains and using ETH on Arbitrum One network. You can bet using $BETS token too which is native token of the platform, plus with some other less popular ones. Can try out the platform with testnets of above chains as well. Documentation: https://documentation.betswirl.com/Website: https://www.betswirl.com/ Disclaimer: I'm not affiliated with BetSwirl.
